plot: In the middle of summer, Santa Claus appears to 8-year-old Marlon with a secret but discovers that the myth overshadows the man, and the dreams of others always come before his own.
title: Santa's Little Helper
plot_es: In the middle of summer, Santa Claus appears to 8-year-old Marlon with a secret but discovers that the myth overshadows the man, and the dreams of others always come before his own.
plot_en: In the middle of summer, Santa Claus appears to 8-year-old Marlon with a secret but discovers that the myth overshadows the man, and the dreams of others always come before his own.
